segments.text: I notice the kitchen's layout, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a nice garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, focused on her dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet pouring water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She steps in the puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets are open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A cookie jar sits there, full and tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool to reach it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobblesâ€” that could be dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
